abstract: Creates an instance using the provided date, time, locale, calendar, time zone, and capitalization context.

declaration.code: init(date: Date.IntervalFormatStyle.DateStyle? = nil, time: Date.IntervalFormatStyle.TimeStyle? = nil, locale: Locale = .autoupdatingCurrent, calendar: Calendar = .autoupdatingCurrent, timeZone: TimeZone = .autoupdatingCurrent)

overview:
## Discussion

Customize the date interval string by providing a date style, time style, locale, calendar, time zone, and capitalization scheme.

Values for date style are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/complete], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/long], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/abbreviated], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/numeric], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/omitted], or `none`. Time style values are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/TimeStyle/complete], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/TimeStyle/standard], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/TimeStyle/shortened], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/TimeStyle/omitted], or `none`.

# init(date:time:locale:calendar:timeZone:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance using the provided date, time, locale, calendar, time zone, and capitalization context.

## Declaration

```swift
init(date: Date.IntervalFormatStyle.DateStyle? = nil, time: Date.IntervalFormatStyle.TimeStyle? = nil, locale: Locale = .autoupdatingCurrent, calendar: Calendar = .autoupdatingCurrent, timeZone: TimeZone = .autoupdatingCurrent)
```

## Parameters

- **date**: The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle] for creating the string representation of the date interval.
- **time**: The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/TimeStyle] for creating the string representation of the date interval.
- **locale**: The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Locale] for creating the string representation of the date interval.
- **calendar**: The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Calendar] for creating the string representation of the date interval.
- **timeZone**: The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/TimeZone] for creating the string representation of the date interval.

## Discussion

Customize the date interval string by providing a date style, time style, locale, calendar, time zone, and capitalization scheme.

Values for date style are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/complete], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/long], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/abbreviated], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/numeric], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/omitted], or `none`. Time style values are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/TimeStyle/complete], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/TimeStyle/standard], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/TimeStyle/shortened], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/TimeStyle/omitted], or `none`.
title: init(date:time:locale:calendar:timeZone:)
